Experimental Validation.Method: Single-component gas adsorption isotherms, dye adsorption studies, zeta potential measurements, PXRD, SEM, TG analysis.
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Selective CO2 adsorption (3.82 mmol/g) over CH4 and N2 (CO2/CH4 selectivity: 8.84, CO2/N2 selectivity: 72.56). Selective adsorption of MB (415.78 mg/g) over RhB, MO, and CR (negligible adsorption).

Other Information.Additional Info: Multifunctional anionic MOF, 2-fold interpenetrated 3D framework, water-stable, amide-functionalized pores, protonated pbisoixH2 counterions fill part of the pores.
